name: Color Splash (itch)
description:
Color Splash is a matching game with HD beautiful and colorful graphics where you match colors to pop them

Designed specifically for Children and for elders also, the game features HD graphics and addicting gameplay.
Pop the colors, earn points and score as high as possible.
Earn stars by completing levels in minimum moves
Use 5 different types of power-ups to clear levels easily
Play as long as you can because there are Unlimited Levels with increasing difficulty.
100% Ad free

Spread the love and share this game with your family members specially kids and you friends
#ColorSplash
